lead_paragraph: Hungary's 'Iron Lady' Katinka Hosszu smashed the world record on her way to winning the women's 400 metres individual medley on Saturday and claiming her first Olympic medal at her fourth Games.

headline.print_headline: Swimming-Hosszu Wins Women's 400m Individual Medley in World Record Time
headline.main: Swimming-Hosszu Wins Women's 400m Individual Medley in World Record Time

snippet: Hungary's 'Iron Lady' Katinka Hosszu smashed the world record on her way to winning the women's 400 metres individual medley on Saturday and claiming her first Olympic medal at her fourth Games....
